middle.title: Intermediate computer skills
middle.level: Typescript, Express, Remix.run, Craftmanship, Docker, Meteor, MongoDB, MySQL, Agile, Git

problem_solving.title: Ability to solve problems
problem_solving.level: Able to find effective solutions to problems that arise, allowing to work independently and make decisions quickly.

leadership.title: Sense of leadership
leadership.level: Able to lead in a difficult situation for the well-being of all.

pedagogy.title: Pedagogy
pedagogy.level: Able to clearly teach technical principles to facilitate understanding and reinforce knowledge in both others and self.

college.title: Fontaine des Eaux High School, Dinan, FRANCE, from September 2012 à July 2015
college.level: Baccalaureate diploma, specialty science and technology and sustainable development

university.title: School 42, Paris, FRANCE, from November 2015 to August 2017
university.level: Intensive and autonomous training in software development, with intensive learning of C and PHP

items.title: Eboueur, Community of communes of Plancoêt, Paris, FRANCE, July 2014
items.value: As a garbage collector for the community of communes of Plancoët, I was responsible for the collection and treatment of household waste. I loaded the bins into the truck and took part in unloading them into the incinerator pit, while respecting safety standards.

items.title: Eboueur, Community of communes of Plancoêt, Paris, FRANCE, July 2014
items.value: As a garbage collector for the community of communes of Plancoët, I was responsible for the collection and treatment of household waste. I loaded the bins into the truck and took part in unloading them into the incinerator pit, while respecting safety standards.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, MeilleurSCPI, Paris, FRANCE, from August 2017 to May 2018
items.value: Work in PHP with a legacy framework and in Vue.js 2, learning Bootstrap and teamwork with Git.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, Solicis, Paris, FRANCE, from May 2018 to August 2018
items.value: Deepening of knowledge in PHP to integrate a showcase site for a house selling agency, use of the Zend framework.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, Monbuilding, Paris, FRANCE, from August 2018 to October 2018
items.value: Discovery of Meteor.js and ReactJS, immersion in the NodeJS universe and real-time applications.

items.title: C# software developer, Ededoc, Angoulême, FRANCE, from November 2018 to July 2020
items.value: Learning C# code for the development of a virtual printer application, creation of an email delivery traceability system, integration of the electronic signature of documents in the printer workflow, development in JavaScript of a scrapping system to recover invoices.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, F.ASS.T, Angoulême, FRANCE, from July 2020 to now
items.value: Development of Fullstack platform in ReactJS and GraphQL for insurers, development of backend services in Javascript as well as in Typescript to connect to a MongoDB database. Participation in the project architecture division and TechLead.
